snippet: Residents of the nation’s capital will be able to get licenses to carry concealed handguns outside their homes, but only after they show a reason for needing one.
lead_paragraph: Residents of the nation’s capital will be able to get licenses to carry concealed handguns outside their homes, but only after they show a reason for needing one.

headline.main: Washington: Plan Would Require a Reason for Concealed Handguns
headline.print_headline: Plan Would Require a Reason For Concealed Handguns
